El Taj Ocean is very close to 5th Avenue, which is full of tourist restaurants and shops. If you're looking for an authentic but quiet restaurant, that's not the place to go. As mentioned, after the first day, we treked to the Super Walmart and bought some items for the condo. We walked there but took a taxi back due to the bags. There were plenty of taxis on site, and it was only $4 to return to the condo. Although there were a few items in the condo refrigerator for purchase, they weren't items we needed for children, so it was worth the trip to the store. Although on the beach, the condo itself was relatively quiet despite its proximity to nearby clubs and restaurants. Only one night did we have a problem with the noise--a disc jockey on a microphone at someplace nearby--but it did not last late. The staff at El Taj Ocean was very helpful and professional. The front desk attendants assisted in making reservations at the Hidden Worlds park and called Cancun Valet when our airport transport was running a few minutes behind schedule. Overall, we were very pleased with the accomodations and have already recommended it to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful & luxurious. Incredible ocean view & proximity to beach. #333!”
Reviews.Author: georgiaphiladelphia
Reviews.Content: El Taj is an amazingly beautiful hotel. We stayed in #333, and it couldn't have been more perfect. We were looking for something special...not generic! Everything is clean, cool and comfortable. Marble floors, granite counters, chic furniture, and a serious view of the caribbean!! Super tasteful, streamlined decor. Large living room, full kitchen, 3 bedrooms, each with a bath. Large balcony with private jacuzzi! Situated right on the beach with an awesome beach club (beach chairs/umbrellas, full restaurant with excellent food). And the pool overlooks the beach, so you are never without that amazing ocean view. We traveled with children and it was especially convenient to be steps away from room, pool, and beach. Impeccable, friendly, helpful service. The property in general is a sublime experience. Lush foliage, rustling palm trees, sparkling sea. It is especially magical at night. Something about the air and the iridescence. In regard to the hotel's proximity to town, it's just steps away from the super cool 5th Ave. Fine restaurants, cool shops. If you've never been to "Playa," I highly recommend it. Very international crowd. All different kinds of fine cuisine, from Mexican to Italian to Thai. Homemade pizza & gelato! Truly a beach vacation combined with amazing culinary delights! If you're looking for nightlife, you won't be disappointed. Super cool lounges & beach parties with a distinct "Playa" vibe, totally different from overdeveloped Cancun. Then of course there's the Mayan Riviera itself! Amazing ruins, nature adventures, diving. I will definitely be back, and there is no better place than El Taj!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent El Taj”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryOilBaron
Reviews.Content: We stayed in El Taj 345 for 10 very enjoyable days in March. El Taj 345 is an upper level unit with an amazing rooftop terrace that included a hot tub, BBQ, fridge, and dining & lounging area. You can even see Cozumel from the rooftop terrace which was great at night. El Taj is centrally located to 5th Avenue and the main tourist district. We walked everywhere including many great restaurants, grocery stores and liquor stores. There was nightlife to be had very nearby as well, but El Taj itself is very quiet and the nightclubs were not to be heard when you were back in the resort. The beach and pool were amazing and it was great to have a nice beach club with loungers, umbrellas and drink service right at your doorstep. And the staff was very friendly. El Taj is virtually brand new and the attention to detail in the build quality is unparalled. We can't wait to go back to El Taj 345 again! Brian R.

Reviews.Title: “An amazing place to spend with your family”
Reviews.Author: bashar911
Reviews.Content: This place was recommended by a friend that used it in the past. i went with my girlfriend and 2 yr old twins as well as her parents. We had suite number 345 and this place was 1500 square foot 3 bedroom full condo with everything you need. Fulkl kitchen, washer and dryer. It is literally brand new and was gorgeous. And the best part was this condo had a 1200 square foot upper level terrace which had a great BBQ, an awesome hot tub! and a great big sitting area under a palapa. We ended every day there and had a great great time. I've stayed in many places but this place is WOW. It was an 8 minute walk to Walmart to buy milk and diapers and fruit etcc. Its 5 minutes away from great restaurants and nightclubs and shopping. You dont need a car. Everythning is in walking distance. When we shopped at Walmart, it cost $5 for a taxi to the condo. I highly recommend this place. Its posh, brand new and has everything you need. Pool, Beach, privacy and access to everything. Bashar Kamel Calgary, Alberta

Reviews.Title: “El Taj Beach Side - WOWWWW! Everything you could possible ask for!”
Reviews.Author: leight_28
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 2 bedroom penthouse condo, and from the first moment of walking into the hotel, we were amazed how everything looked. As soon as you walk up the entrance stairs your breath is taken away from the view of the condos overlooking the ocean. Great first impression! All the staff are very friendly and would do anything for us. Our condo was very stylish, had everything we needed and the cleaners always kept the condo spotless. Also the hotel is situated very very close to the main bars/clubs and all the restaurants & shops, (2 min walk) If i was to go to playa del carmen again, there would be no other hotel i would stay at EL TAJ is definately the place to stay!!!!!!!
